thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com | 2 of 320
thread.title: Sarah Spencer

author: Sarah Spencer
title: Sarah Spencer
text: We have always been impressed by the amazing prices and fast shipping, but when we finally had to say goodbye to our cat Angel, the Chewy.com customer service team went above and beyond to assist us in this difficult time. Josh at customer service gave us a credit for the remaining food, easily cancelled our recurring order and sent flowers with a lovely, heartfelt note wishing us peace and good memories of our fur baby. Such an excellent company!
